summary: THE ENGINE SHUTS DOWN WHILE THE VEHICLE IS IN MOTION. THIS HAS HAPPENED 3 TIMES AT LESS THAN 15 MPH ON MY PRIVATE ROAD AND 1 TIME AT ~30 MPH ON A PUBLIC ROAD THROUGH TOWN. I HAVE ONLY OWNED THIS VEHICLE A COUPLE OF MONTHS AND THE PREVIOUS OWNER PURCHASED THE VEHICLE FROM A DEALER IN JANUARY ONLY OWNED THE VEHICLE
